word:
Evil Angels or God's Angels Control Men's Minds. --Either the evil angels or the angels of God are controlling the minds of men. Our minds are given to the control of God or to the control of the powers of darkness; and it will be well for us to inquire where we are standing today --whether under the bloodstained banner of Prince 

26 

Emmanuel or under the black banner of the powers of darkness.--MS 1, 1890. (6BC 1120.)
